abstracts.cdata!:
This project paper provides an
            additional loan to scale up and restructure the First
            East-West Highway Improvement Project (FEWHIP). The FEWHIP
            additional financing will support the rehabilitation of the
            Rikoti Tunnel, repair its by-pass road, and provide
            additional institutional strengthening. Restructuring is
            required to accommodate a slight revision of the project
            development objective to include the tunnel and related
            changes to the results framework.
